DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of IV administered ERB-257 as single ascending doses to healthy Japanese male subjects
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Ascending Single IV Doses of ERB-257 in Healthy Japanese Males
DOC.criteria: 1. Healthy Japanese men between the ages of 20 and 50. 2. Body mass index (BMI) in the range of 17.6 to 26.4 kg/m2 and body weight greater than or equal to 45 kg2. 3. Have a high probability for compliance with and completion of the study. 1. Presence or history of any disorder that may prevent the successful completion of the study. 2. Acute disease state (eg, nausea, vomiting, infection, fever, or diarrhea) within 7 days before study day 1.
